concept.title: Issues Beyond Coil and Plug Problems
concept.shortdesc: When coil and plug function properly, engine issues may stem from valve seating problems, commutator wear, electrical shorts, or gasket leaks.

section.title: Common Causes
section.p: When coil and plug issues have been ruled out, consider these potential problems:

ol.li: Lift it slowly through each cylinder's stroke length
Assess compression strength for each valve

section.title: Checking Gasket Integrity
section.p: To test for cylinder head gasket leaks:

ol.li: Apply lubricating oil around the gasket edge
Presence of bubbles indicates gas escape under compression
